oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 6 from oral history interview with James Stephen Turner, 2006 June 21
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville business and civic leader James Stephen (Steve) Turner, conducted on 21 June 2006 by Andrea Blackman as part of the Nashville Public Library's Nashville Business Leaders Oral History Project: The Turner Interviews. Turner discusses the fact that much of his involvement has been in the arts because he believes that people can better relate to one another as human beings through the arts. The complete interview, as well as an index, is available in the repository.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Turner, James Stephen--Interviews
